statements: SELECT id, description, amount, type, date FROM expenses_and_revenues;
SELECT type, description, id, amount, date FROM expenses_and_revenues;
SELECT date, amount, type, id, description FROM expenses_and_revenues;
SELECT id, type, description FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE type = 'revenue';
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_revenues ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE type = 'expense' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT id, description, type FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE type = 'revenue' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, description, date FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE type = 'expense' AND date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_name LIKE 'Grocery%';
SELECT * FROM revenues ORDER BY revenue_amount ASC;
SELECT revenue_source, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenues GROUP BY revenue_source;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date > '2022-01-01' AND expense_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY revenue_date ASC;
SELECT expense_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_name HAVING total_expense > 2000;
SELECT * FROM expenses INNER JOIN revenues ON expenses.expense_amount = revenues.revenue_amount;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT category, amount, date FROM revenues WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_id, category, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT source, amount FROM revenues WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT operation_id, location, start_date, end_date FROM operations WHERE location LIKE '%Office%'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE source IN ('Sale', 'Service') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING total_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM operations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE revenue_source LIKE '%farm%';
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farms WHERE farm_size > 100 ORDER BY farm_name;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT farm_name, farm_location, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM farms JOIN farm_expenses ON farms.farm_id = farm_expenses.farm_id JOIN expenses ON farm_expenses.expense_id = expenses.expense_id GROUP BY farm_name, farm_location HAVING total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT revenue_source, AVG(revenue_amount) AS average_revenue FROM revenues GROUP BY revenue_source HAVING average_revenue > 200 ORDER BY average_revenue ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT farm_name, COUNT(*) AS total_expense_count FROM farms JOIN farm_expenses ON farms.farm_id = farm_expenses.farm_id GROUP BY farm_name HAVING total_expense_count > 3 ORDER BY total_expense_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM farms WHERE farm_size < 100 ORDER BY farm_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT revenue_source, revenue_amount FROM revenues ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM farm_workers WHERE worker_role = 'Manager';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM farm_inventory WHERE item_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT worker_name, worker_role, worker_salary FROM farm_workers WHERE worker_role = 'Harvester' ORDER BY worker_salary DESC;
SELECT operation_type, operation_date, operation_description FROM farm_operations WHERE operation_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_price ASC, item_name DESC;
